Translations.Text: Apalya ati ucca palanakartyacya navaci pavitrata varnana kara
Jyane nirmana kele ani sahi salamata banavile
Ani jyane (yathayogya) anumana kele ani maga margadarsana kele
Ani jyane taje gavata ugavile
Maga tyane te (sukavuna) kala kera - kacara karuna takale
Amhi tumhala sikavu, maga tumhi visaranara nahi
Parantu je kahi allaha icchila. Nihsansaya, to ughada ani lapalele sarva kahi janato
Ani amhi tumacyasathi sahajata nirmana karu
Tevha tumhi upadesa karita raha jara upadesa kahi labha de'ila
(Allahace) bhaya balaganara tara bodha grahana karila
Tathapi durdaivi, yapasuna dura palela
Jo mothya bhayankara agita dakhala ho'ila
Jithe maga to na marela, na jagela, (kimbahuna maranasanna sthititaca paduna rahila)
Nihsansaya, tyane saphalata prapta keli, jo svaccha sud'dha jhala
Ani jyane apalya palanakartyace nama smaranata thevale, ani namaja padhata rahila
Parantu tumhi tara aihika jivanalaca pradhan'ya deta
Ani akhirata (maranottara jivana) atisaya uttama nirantara tikuna rahanari ahe
Ya gostice varnana purvi (avatarita jhalelya) granthatahi ahe
(Arthata) ibrahima ani musa yancya granthata
Kaya tumhalahi, jhakuna takanarya (kayamata) ci varta pohacali ahe
Tya divasi bahuteka cehare apamanita asatila
(Ani) duhkhanni pidita kasta - yatanagrasta asatila
Te dhagadhagatya agita ja'una padatila
Ani atisaya usna jharyace pani tyanna pajale ja'ila
Tyancyasathi katedara jhadankherija anakhi kahi khayala nasela
Je na tyanna dhasta pusta karila, na tyanci bhuka mitavila
Bahuteka cehare tya divasi praphulla tavatavita ani (susampanna sthitita) asatila
Apalya karmammule anandita asatila
Ucca (praticya) jannatimmadhye asatila
Jithe konatihi asabhya nirarthaka gosta aikanara nahita
Jithe (sitala) jhare vahata asatila
(Ani) tya (jannatim) madhye unca unca asane asatila
Ani pyale thevalele (asatila)
Ani eka rangeta lavalele takke asatila
Ani ma'u makhamali galice pasaralele asatila
Kaya he untakade nahi pahata ki tyanna kasa prakare nirmana kele gele ahe
Ani akasanna ki kasa prakare unca kele gele ahe
Ani parvatankade, ki kasa prakare gadale gele aheta
Ani jaminikade ki kasa prakare ti bichavili geli ahe
Tara tumhi upadesa karita raha (karana) tumhi phakta upadesa karanare ahata
Tumhi kahi yancyavara dekharekha thevanare nahita
Parantu jo manusya tonda phiravila ani inkara karila
Tyala sarvasrestha allaha phara motha azaba (siksa - yatana) de'ila
Nihsansaya, tyanna tara amacyacakade paratayace ahe
Nihsansaya, tyanca hisoba ghenyaci jababadari amaci ahe
Sapatha ahe pratahkalaci
Ani daha ratrinci
Ani sama ani visama sankhyeci
Ani ratrici jevha ti nighu lagavi
Kaya yata bud'dhimanansathi puresi sapatha ahe
Kaya tumhi nahi pahile ki tumacya palanakartyane adacya lokansi kaya vyavahara kela
Mothamothe khamba banavinarya iramasi
Jyancyasarakha (konatahi janasamuha) an'ya bhubhagata nirmana kela gela nahi
Ani samudacya lokansi, jyanni darya-khoryata mothamothe pasana korale hote
Ani phira'aunasi, jo mekha balaganara hota
Ya sarvanni dharativara upadrava pasaravila hota
Ani khupa utpata (phasada) majavila hota
Sevati tumacya palanakartyane ya sarvanvara azabaca asuda barasavila
Nihsansaya, tumaca palanakarta laksa thevuna ahe
Manasa (ci hi dasa ahe ki) jevha tyaca palanakarta tyaci pariksa gheto, ani tyala mana pratistha va krpa denagya pradana karato tevha to mhanu lagato ki majhya palanakartyane mala sanmanita kele
Ani jevha to (allaha) yaci kasoti gheto, tyaci ajivika tanga (kami) karuna takato, tevha to mhanu lagato ki majhya palanakartyane majhi avhelana keli (ani mala apamanita kele)
Ase mulica nahi kimbahuna (khari gosta asi) ki tumhi loka anathaca mana-sanmana rakhata nahi
Ani garibanna jevu ghalanyace ekamekanna protsahana deta nahi
Ani (melelyanci) varasa sampatti gola karuna khatata
Ani dhana-sampattisi jivanapada prema rakhata
Nihsansaya, jaminila jevha kuthuna kuthuna tila agadi sapata kele ja'ila
Ani tumaca palanakarta (svatah) prakata ho'ila ani phariste ranga bandhuna (yetila)
Ani jya divasi jahannamalahi anale ja'ila tya divasi manusa bodha grahana karila. Parantu ata tyacya bodha grahana karanyaca kaya labha
To mhanela ki mi apalya ya jivanakarita kahi satkarme, pahilyapasuna karuna thevali asati tara phara bare jhale asate
Tara aja allahacya siksa - yatanesarakhi siksa - yatana an'ya konacihi nasela
Na tyacya bandhanasarakhe konace bandhana asela
He santusta atma
Tu apalya palanakartyakade parata cala, asa avastheta ki tu tyacyasi raji, to tujhyasi prasanna
Tevha, majhya khasa dasammadhye samila ho
Ani majhya jannatamadhye pravesa kara
